profile.logout_text: Are you sure you want to log out?

force_narrow.description: This will hide the sidebar by default, similar to the mobile experience.

customize_sidebar.header: Change the order and hide items from the sidebar
customize_sidebar.description: You can also press and hold the header of the sidebar to activate edit mode.

vibrate.description: Enable or disable vibration on this device when controlling devices.

enable_shortcuts.description: Enable or disable keyboard shortcuts for performing various actions in the UI.

suspend.description: Should we close the connection to the server after being hidden for 5 minutes?

add_device_prompt.title: What should this device be called?

time_zone.description: Choose the time zone to use for displaying times.

first_weekday.description: Choose the starting day for calendars.

dashboard.description: Pick a default dashboard for this device.

change_password.error_new_mismatch: Entered new password values do not match
change_password.error_new_is_old: New password must be different than current password
change_password.logout_all_sessions: Do you want to log out from all devices?
change_password.logout_all_sessions_text: This will require you to log in again on all devices with your new password, including this one.
change_password.delete_failed: Not all devices could be logged out

refresh_tokens.description: Each refresh token represents a login session. Refresh tokens will be automatically removed when you click log out. Unused refresh tokens will be automatically removed after 90 days. The following refresh tokens are currently active for your account.
refresh_tokens.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete the refresh token for {name}?
refresh_tokens.confirm_delete_all: Are you sure you want to delete all refresh tokens? Your current session token will not be removed. Your long-lived access tokens will not be removed.
refresh_tokens.delete_failed: Errorea sortu da sarbide tokena ezabatzerakoan.

long_lived_access_tokens.description: Create long-lived access tokens to allow your scripts to interact with your NDX IoT Platform instance. Each token will be valid for 10 years from creation. The following long-lived access tokens are currently active.
long_lived_access_tokens.learn_auth_requests: Learn how to make authenticated requests.
long_lived_access_tokens.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete the access token for {name}?
long_lived_access_tokens.delete_failed: Errorea sortu da sarbide tokena ezabatzerakoan.
long_lived_access_tokens.create_failed: Ezin izan da sarbide token sortu.
long_lived_access_tokens.name: Izena
long_lived_access_tokens.prompt_copy_token: Zure sarbide tokena kopiatu. Ez da berriro erakutsiko.
long_lived_access_tokens.empty_state: You have no long-lived access tokens yet.
